paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR Asn 90 variant, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.phenotype: No indicators found for an association with traits characteristic for FAP.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Carrier of the Met 30 substitution and the acidic variant.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: one case, from an FAP kindred, was simultaneously carrier of the Met 30 substitution and the acidic variant
one individual, from the randomly selected Portuguese sample, had only the acidic monomer.

functional_data.summary: The acidic variant was characterized by an abnormal tryptic peptide not present in normal TTR digests.
assays: hybrid isoelectric focusing in immobilized pH gradient (HIEF)

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with the Met 30 substitution in one family.
variants.population_frequency: 2/4,000 in German subjects, 4/1,200 in Portuguese subjects
variants.additional_notes: No indicators found for an association with traits characteristic for FAP.
key_quotes: This variant has a lower pI and was found by screening analyses in 2/4,000 German subjects and in 4/1,200 Portuguese.
In all carriers of the Asn 90 substitution, no indicators were found for an association with traits characteristic for FAP.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text.
